entries.name: Software Development (General)
description: Experienced developing software both as a full stack developer and as a team lead.
Developed SPA web applications, REST/SOAP web services, and modular utilities using various technologies including Java EE, AngularJS, and Google Web Toolkit.
Experienced leading and mentoring teams of programmers on various projects.
Knowledge of development best practices, methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Multi-disciplined in areas including programming, databases, IT, security, and UI/UX.

entries.name: Java / Java EE
description: Developed enterprise web applications, middleware/legacy system adapters, and a simulation/game framework.
Experienced with EE technology stack, including usage of EJB, JPA, and CDI.
Extensively used common APIs and frameworks including Google Web Toolkit (GWT), Apache Commons, JasperReports, and more.
Configured and deployed applications to various application servers, including JBoss and IBM's WebSphere.

entries.name: SQL
description: Designed and implemented normalized, relational database architectures for multiple applications.
Developed database-driven applications.
Wrote and tested injection-safe queries and prepared statements for multiple applications.
Familiar with server technologies including Oracle PL/SQL, IBM DB2, MySQL, and Apache Derby.

entries.name: AngularJS
description: Architected, designed, and developed several small-scale web applications using AngularJS.
Currently developing several enterprise-scale web applications using an AngularJS front-end and REST back-end.
Trained and mentored 6 other developers in learning the AngularJS framework and associated best practices

entries.name: Google Web Toolkit (GWT)
description: Architected, designed, and developed an enterprise record management system with a GWT front-end.
Created reusable widget libraries used to provide standardized functionality and look-and-feel across multiple web applications.
Trained and mentored other developers in understanding the GWT framework and associated best practices.

entries.name: Web Technologies
description: Designed and implemented multiple web static web sites using HTML and CSS.
Developed several dynamic enterprise web applications using HTML/CSS/JS front-ends and Java backends.
Experienced with full stack development involving Javascript front-ends and REST/SOAP web service backends.

entries.name: Python
description: Programmed software including client-server applications and a web service
Experienced with core Python 2.7.x libraries.

description: 4.00 out of 4.00 GPA
8 courses / 24 credits remaining

entries.name: B.S. in Computer Science
description: 3.99 out of 4.00 GPA
Graduated Summa Cum Laude
Nominated valedictorian by the Department of Math and Computer Science

entries.name: Full Stack Developer / Team Lead / Systems Analyst / Consultant
entries.blurb: eWorld Enterprise Solutions, Inc. | August 2013 - Present
description: Led a 4-member development team in creating enterprise web applications and middleware.
Architected, designed, and programmed several enterprise systems that are now in production.
Experienced developing web applications, REST/SOAP web services, and mainframe modernization middleware.
Mentored junior developers, teaching them coding, best practices, technologies, and designs.
Championed technologies and practices which were adopted as organizational standards.

entries.name: Technical Analyst Assistant
description: Worked directly with end-users and teammates to resolve 1000+ hardware, software, and network issues.
Monitored and maintained a computer lab with 100+ systems and 3500+ weekly users.
Trained and mentored 16 teammates in fulfilling relevant job responsibilities.
Created reports for management by analyzing datasets with 200,000+ elements.

entries.name: Computer Services Consultant
description: Provided independent computer services to dozens of long-term clients.
Consulted with clients and grave professional recommendations for technology purchases and decisions.
Deployed, secured, and optimized home Local Area Networks.
Custom built dozens of computer systems, including powerful gaming machines and reliable, efficient business PCs.
Performed hardware repairs, virus/malware removal, backup/data recovery services, and performance optimization for PCs.
